remarks: Change bound variable.  Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes.  Part of Lemma 7 of [KalishMontague] p. 86.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Apr-2017.)
statement:
cbvaliw.1 $e |- ( A. x ph -> A. y A. x ph ) $.
cbvaliw.2 $e |- ( -. ps -> A. x -. ps ) $.
cbvaliw.3 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
cbvaliw $p |- ( A. x ph -> A. y ps ) $.
$d x y $.
